title: Looking for partner DUO BOT LANE
body:
Hello summoners!
I'm looking for a partner for DUO BOT LANE either ADC  or Support as I can also play both.
I'm looking to start ranked games with the right foot and duo queue with someone.

Please add me:

Captain Salazar
OCE

replies.body: I'd be happy to play with you : )
my man wanna duo ? am adc main
Hi - I've sent you an in game invite - I main support and would like to duo :)
Hi i main support and im also looking for a duo partner.
